title: Mac and Cheese Seasoning Boosters

items.name: Savory & Bold: garlic powder
items.details: A classic addition that enhances the cheese flavor.

items.name: Savory & Bold: onion powder
items.details: Adds depth without the texture of fresh onion.

items.name: Savory & Bold: smoked paprika
items.details: Adds a deeper, almost bacon-like edge to the mac and cheese.

items.name: Savory & Bold: coarse black pepper
items.details: More bite than fine ground pepper.

items.name: Savory & Bold: mustard powder
items.details: Subtle tang that enhances the cheese flavor.

items.name: Spicy: cayenne pepper or red pepper flakes
Spicy: hot sauce
items.details: Cholula, Frank's, or Tabasco all work well.

items.name: Umami boost: Worcestershire sauce
items.details: Just a dash adds savory depth.

items.name: Herby/Fresh: chives, parsley, basil, or thyme
items.details: Basil pairs well if adding tomatoes or meat. Thyme is good if baking the mac afterward.

items.name: Quick weeknight combo
items.details: Garlic powder + smoked paprika + black pepper. Add cayenne or hot sauce for heat.

notes: Works specifically with Kraft Original Cheddar Mac & Cheese but these seasonings apply to any boxed or homemade mac and cheese. The mild, creamy base takes well to all of these additions.
